name: Stop the Titan!
description:
Stop the Titan!

Use your grappling hooks to keep up with the Titan, impale the weak spots and slam the other player's anchor to stop the Titan.


Controls:

Join - A Button
Aim - Right Joystick
Grappling hook - Right Trigger (grapple on release)
Impale - A Button / Left Trigger
Anchor slam - B Button
Pause - Pause


Controller required!
Two players required to play. Local co-op, works well online with Parsec.

Sound FX from Soundsnap.com
Player sprites by clembod.itch.io (color modified)

by Joshua Ásberg & Hjörtur Jóhann

Known bugs:
Restarting is broken, game needs to be relaunched to try again.
